meanings.definition: The act of traveling in a taxi.
meanings.sent1: After a long day at work, I took a cabbing ride home.
meanings.sent2: She prefers cabbing to driving in heavy traffic.
meanings.sent3: The cabbing adventure turned into a fun conversation with the driver.
meanings.sent4: In the city, cabbing through the bustling streets feels like a movie scene.
meanings.sent5: The convenience of cabbing makes commuting stress-free.

meanings.definition: The act of cutting or shaping a gemstone.
meanings.sent1: The jeweler's precise cabbing technique enhanced the beauty of the gem.
meanings.sent2: Cabbing requires skill and attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The cabbing process transformed the rough stone into a sparkling jewel.
meanings.sent4: Watching the expert cabbing the gem was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The art of cabbing brings out the brilliance of the gemstone.

meanings.definition: The act of enclosing or covering with a cab.
meanings.sent1: The cabbing of the machinery protects it from dust and debris.
meanings.sent2: Cabbing the wires ensures safety and organization.
meanings.sent3: The cabbing of the garden plants kept them safe from pests.
meanings.sent4: The cabbing shielded the delicate equipment from harsh weather.
meanings.sent5: Proper cabbing of the equipment extends its lifespan.
